short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I will keep you updated with the latest happenings, upcoming contests and, new tech innovations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dev Essentials is a Chrome Extension built for Developers and Tech Enthusiasts, to keep them updated with the latest happenings, upcoming contests and, new tech innovations.

🎯 Light Weight (<1MB)
🎯 Cool and Modern UI
🎯 Popup type extension

🎯 Get top Posts from your Favourite Platforms!
      - Hashnode.com | Dev.to | Github.com | Thehackernews.com

🎯 Task List
       - Make comitments to yourself. Start your day your day with planing.
  
 🎯 Coding Contests
       - Upcoming and Ongoing contests from your Favourite heart Platforms!
       - Codechef.com | Codeforces.com | Hackerearth.com | Leetcode.com | CTFtime.org

🎯 Tech Hunt
      - Top 10 news on Apple...
      - Recent 10 posts on Tesla
      - and get 10 latest and most liked posts matching with your keyword.

 🎯 Join community forums
      - Give Feedback, Suggestion and chat with other community members.
      - Get update announcement before anyone else.


It is open source!
Dev Essentials need ⭐️ from you.
https://github.com/hardikk2002/Dev-Essentials

Thank you!
